Adds translation for Dutch and Chinese, and updates translations for German, Spanish, Italian, and Polish. If you have feedback on the translations or would like to contribute, we'd love to hear from you: please email translations@uavforecast.com.

Updates for iOS 12.
Small bug fix. Some users with subscriptions may unfortunately need to log into their accounts again.

* Adds translations for Hungarian and Korean.
* Minor bug fixes and translation improvements.
Fixes issue with map layout on iPhone X/XS.
Bug fixes and improvements.
Small but important bug fix.
Minor bug fixes and improvements.

This is a complete rewrite of the app - UAV Forecast 2.0 is newer, faster, and better.

* It's faster, particularly the Forecast tab.
* The forecast header stays in view to make the table easier to understand.
* The layout in landscape mode and on tablets is much improved.
* The wind direction arrow has a compass legend.
* Lots of other small improvements.

If you find a bug, have feedback, or need support, please email support@uavforecast.com. Thanks!

This is a complete rewrite of the app - UAV Forecast 2.0 is newer, faster, and better.
* It's faster, particularly the Forecast tab.
* The forecast header stays in view to make the table easier to understand.
* The layout in landscape mode and on tablets is much improved.
* The wind direction arrow has a compass legend.
* Lots of other small improvements.

If you find a bug, have feedback, or need support, please email support@uavforecast.com. Thanks!

This is a complete rewrite of the app - UAV Forecast 2.0 is newer, faster, and better.

* It's faster, particularly the Forecast tab.
* The forecast header stays in view to make the table easier to understand. 
* The layout in landscape mode and on tablets is much improved.
* The wind direction arrow has a compass legend. You can also choose magnetic North.
* Lots of other small improvements.

If you find a bug, have feedback, or need support, please email support@uavforecast.com. Thanks!
Small bug fixes.

Adds a new location autocomplete feature.

Adds Russian, with thanks to Ренат Нурмухаметов and Арсен Микитов for the translation assistance.

If you find bugs or have feedback, please feel free to reach out to support@uavforecast.com.

* Adds Swedish translation, thanks to Marcus Aronsson for the translation assistance.
* Improves Russian translation, thanks to Арсен Микитов.
* Adds "X" to top right of forecast header to dismiss it quickly.
* Adds ability to edit the value of any setting by tapping on the text to the right of each slider.
* Improves Wind Altitude slider, adding logarithmically spaced steps.

* Adds translations for Hungarian and Korean.
* Minor bug fixes and translation improvements.
Adds long-requested "Favorite Locations" feature: subscribers can now save up to 5 locations and quickly switch between them.
You can now click any box on the Conditions tab to read a description and change the threshold or units.
For devices with a built-in compass, tap on the wind arrow to see the relative wind direction using the new "Use Compass" option.
Adds a setting to hide the map legend.

Adds cloud-base to the Current tab, and cloud-base and maximum wind altitude to the Forecast tab (in landscape mode), for subscribers only.

Also adds Danish and Hindi translations.
Minor bug fixes, and adds a threshold for minimum cloud-base for subscribers only.
Adds Ukranian translations.
Minor bug fixes and improvements: fixes compass in landscape-right orientation, and updates Ukranian translations.

Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Minor bug fixes and improvements. Adds Norwegian translations.
Various bug fixes and improvements.
Small bug fix in minimum cloud-base threshold for subscribers.
Adds offline support and improves startup time.

Weather alerts are now shown when available.
Various fixes and improvements. Adds translations for Greek and Czech. Weather alerts are now shown when available.
Various bug fixes.
Fixes incorrect timezone display issue.
Adds Finnish translation and improves performance on some devices.
Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Urgent bug fix for blank screen issue.

Launches our new proprietary weather forecast model, available now as an alternative to Dark Sky, and featuring more detailed and accurate wind and gust speeds, and bearings, at altitude. It's updated hourly in the US and every 6 hours elsewhere. It's currently in beta, and we welcome feedback at forecast@UAVForecast.com.
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
Minor bug fix.
Various improvements and bug fixes. Adds a new palette for color-blind users.
Adds the Time Bar, which lets you select a specific time to see the conditions and wind profile for, and view conditions for the day and week at a glance.
Minor bug fixes and improvements.
